about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Fullstack Javascript junior Developer, with a 15+ years work experience ü§ì
about.description1: I am currently working as a Next.js developer for Dcrypte during a 6-month internship after having comme d√©veloppeur after completing an intensive 6-month training course (798 hours) at the O'Clock school to become a developer.
about.description2: In my previous working experiences, that should be of interest for my future employer, I can rely on 15+ years of hands-on experience and management in global brands Marketing, Communication, Digital and CRM positions, including over 3 years as a Brand Digital Manager and nearly 6 years managing large scale projects and teams (30+ people).
about.description3: My digital expertise covers all fields of application: UX design, media planning, 360 campaigns, audit and reporting, evangelism and top management training. Projects managed went from building a strategy and successfully carrying it out to coordinating various technical stakeholders and being accountable for complex projects with an international spectrum.
about.description4: Being curious about everything and self-taught on numerous expertises, the success of my work relies on a predilection for demanding objectives completion, a strong sense of accountability and a balance between strategic management and operational focus.
